message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it.
Hi Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $200 is a bit out of my budget.  I'm willing to pay $80 for the product.  Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, I understand that $200 is a bit steep for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you the product for $160. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy it.
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $160 is still a bit too much for me.  I'm firm on $80.  If you can't do that, I'll have to go with another seller.
Hi Bob, I understand that you're firm on $80, but I'm not willing to go that low. I can offer you a compromise at $140. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still only able to go up to $80.  This is my final offer, and if you're not willing to accept it, I'll have to go with another seller.

Hi Bob, I understand that you're firm on $80, but I'm not willing to sell the product for that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $140 and $80, which would be $110. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price, but I'm still only able to go up to $80.  This is my final offer, and if you're not willing to accept it, I'll have to go with another seller.

Hi Bob, I understand that you're firm on $80, but I'm not willing to sell the product for that low. I'm willing to give you a small discount from my previous offer, and I can offer you the product for $130. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
